page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: At first sight this appears to be an entirely agricultural area surrounding the small village of Madley. But a short distance SE of the village is Madley Earth Satellite Station which is one of the most important Communication Centres in the entire world _ not even shown on the current Ordnance Survey Map. Madley village itself surrounds an ancient Parish Church unequalled in the County for its size, symmetry and austere beauty. This beautiful Church now houses the Annual Madley Music Festival. This year 1985, it will be celebrating the European Music Year and International Youth Year. The Roman Road which bisects the Survey Area has a number of interesting features adjacent to it, A Farm Museum, a turkey farm, and a training ground for lorry drivers.
